article:
J.K Rowling is the writer of the Harry Potter series, the most popular books.
J.K. Rowling was born in Bristol in 1965. She has one sister _ is two years younger than her. Both girls loved listening to bedtime _ . They loved stories about the magical   world. Rowling _ her first story, called rabbit at the age of six.
 _ she graduated from the university, Rowling worked in London. During that time, on a long train trip in the summer of 1990, the idea of a _ who has magic but doesn't know it himself came to _ . In 1992, Rowling began to teach English. She lived with her daughter, Jessica, and _ much time finishing the first Harry Potter book for young _ . It came out in 1997. To her _ , the book was very successful. The film came out in 2001. Now the Harry Potter series is _ with people of all ages.
Why is the series so successful? Many other magic stories _ place in faraway lands in the past or future times, _ Harry lives in modern England. He 's also a very normal boy. When other _ read the story about Harry, they can _ being like him.
J.K. Rowling is very happy with her success. She says she will go on _ children's books.
